channel.title: Wii Skill Cape
channel.description:
My Wii Skill Cape... I'll be making a DS one and alot of other Console Capes.
99.9% Credits to JaGeX for making the Default Skill Cape Model... and 00.1% for Myself for Recoloring and Adding the Wii Logo
Here's the Wii "Wear" Cape: http://rapidshare.com/files/356395218/Wii_Skill_Cape.mqo
Here's the Wii "Drop" Cape: http://rapidshare.com/files/356402424/Wii_Skill_CapeDROP.mqo
PLEASE COMMENT!!!

item.title: Wii Skill Cape
item.dc:creator: @devinheaven devinheaven
item.description:
@devinheaven wrote:

Sorry to grave dig, but I just realized a few things, and I wanted to clarify a few things too…

(1) Posting this model isn’t just for you to download if you want it, but ALSO for you to tell me what needs to be improved!

(2) It’s a Re-color… SO WHAT!!! If you don’t like it… THEN DON’T WORRY ABOUT IT!!! If you don’t have anything nice to say, DON’T SAY IT!!!

(3) The people that notice that it’s one of my console capes, and you criticize it, why do you go into the thread? If you don’t like it, and you notice that it’s mine… DON’T VIEW IT!!!

(4) I’m Human… And humans make mistakes… Plus… I HAVE FEELINGS!!! AND I’M A BEGINNER!!!

(5) For the people that were asking… I’m 15… And I was 14 when I posted these… You people that criticize my capes are probably 25-40 years old… Plus I’m not experienced… I don’t brag… Because only selfish people brag… And I don’t care what you think… I put Time and Effort on these capes… And I love them… No matter what anybody else thinks…

Read full topic

item.title: Wii Skill Cape
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Biosoft Mr_Biosoft
item.description:
@Mr_Biosoft wrote:

The cape is cool I like the colors but it should be white and blue. Im not fond of recolors but im not a hater either. Im new to metasequoia so i cant even do to much yet lol… However I can say ive spliced a few things just trying to get the feel for the program. Also @ Krack I like that scim and you 8th model reminds me of cloud’s swords from ff7 they look nice.

I think people should lay of the kid he is trying to get a start probably using a tutorial. Yes our models may be better but everyone starts somewhere.

Also can we now let this topic rest in peace?

Read full topic

Now, if he modeled a penis or something and posted it on a skillcape then I’d be with you guys.[/quote] So if i made one with a vagina im in the clear? rofl and dude if your going to do a re-colour try changing the look of the cape maybe use the magnet make it look cool maybe delete some parts all in all try something hard, completing it is far more better feeling and it will also make your skills heighten.

item.title: Wii Skill Cape
item.dc:creator: @DeltaLegitz DeltaLegitz
item.description:
@DeltaLegitz wrote:

Just stop with the re-colors…

  1. No-one likes seeing them except for your “brother” who seems like hes your dog.

  2. You aren’t really making a model by recoloring a cape, just make an item from scratch instead of giving “99.9% credit to JaGeX for the model and 0.1% to you for recoloring”

  3. Posting a recolored cape isn’t going to be used by anyone since if they wanted one they would just make it in less then a minute…

Read full topic
